news_header: At least 40 people have died in Israeli attacks in Lebanon.
news_text: On Wednesday, Israeli attacks in eastern Lebanon resulted in at least 40 deaths and over 50 injuries, particularly in the Bekaa Valley and Baalbek. The death toll may increase as rescuers search for survivors. Since September, Israel has been targeting southern Lebanon, Beirut, and the Bekaa Valley, with continued attacks reported on Thursday.
